XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes>
<!-- Получить людей --> <Route Url="/GetPersons" Method="GET" Call="Simple.Service.Person:GetPersons"/> <Route Url="/GetStatuses" Method="GET" Call="Simple.Service.Status:GetStatuses"/>
<Route Url="/person/:id" Method="GET" Call="Simple.Service.Person:Get"/> <Route Url="/person/save" Method="POST" Call="Simple.Service.Person:Save"/> <Route Url="/person/:id" Method="DELETE" Call="Simple.Service.Person:Delete"/>
</Routes>
